scripts.copy-assets: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');function copyDir(src,dest){if(!fs.existsSync(dest))fs.mkdirSync(dest,{recursive:true});for(const entry of fs.readdirSync(src,{withFileTypes:true})){const srcPath=path.join(src,entry.name);const destPath=path.join(dest,entry.name);if(entry.isDirectory())copyDir(srcPath,destPath);else fs.copyFileSync(srcPath,destPath)}}['react','solid'].forEach(fw=>{['add-ons','toolchains','hosts','examples','project'].forEach(dir=>{const src='src/frameworks/'+fw+'/'+dir;const dest='dist/frameworks/'+fw+'/'+dir;if(fs.existsSync(src))copyDir(src,dest)})})"
